description:
No-Names vs. Perseus; what seems like an easy win for Perseus is anything but.  Izayoi finally gets the chance to go all out and does not disappoint those watching. 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chikai wa Hoshi no Kanata ni Da Sou Desu yo?
Il paraît que le serment est au-delà des étoiles
The Oath Seems to Be Beyond the Stars?
誓いは星の彼方にだそうですよ?
